name: adc_gtm_wideip_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()



def getGTMWideIpList():
    '''
    To get GTM wideip list

    '''

    gtm_wideip_list = []
    db_filter = {'code': 'gw'}
    adc_gtm_wideip_list = connect_db.appviewx.ro.find(db_filter)
    for device in adc_gtm_wideip_list:
        gtm_wideip_list.append(device)
    return gtm_wideip_list
description: To get a list of GTM wideip
_keywords: To get a list of GTM wideip
